entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
